thread.title: How to make £1.8 Million as a Computer Freelancer : How-To-Guide Release
thread.title_full: How to make £1.8 Million as a Computer Freelancer : How-To-Guide Release

title: How to make £1.8 Million as a Computer Freelancer : How-To-Guide Release
text:
How to make £1.8 Million as a Computer Freelancer : How-To-Guide Release 
MCHJAP LTD has released a new how-to guide on How to make £1.8 Million pounds as a Computer Contractor Or Freelancer. Computer Employees and other interested parties can find the guide online at http://www.howtostartcontracting.co.uk/ . 
United Kingdom , 8 October 2015 -- 
How to make £1.8 Million as a Computer Freelancer : How-To-Guide Release 
Computer Consultants business, MCHJAP LTD, has published a new how-to guide dedicated to helping Computer employees earn £1.8 Million pounds in earnings averaging £20K per month. This guide will also have information useful to anybody facing the challenge of making the move from permanent employee to contractor or freelancer. Interested parties are invited to review the how-to guide in full on their website: http://www.howtostartcontracting.co.uk/ This most recent how-to guide from MCHJAP LTD contains precise and detailed steps and instructions, designed to be used by Permanent Computer Employees and others who need it, helping them earn £1.8 Million pounds in earnings, as quickly, easily and with as little stress as possible. MCHJAP LTD states that this accessible, easy to follow guide provides all of the information necessary to fully understand the topic, to get the results they want. The Full How-To Guide Covers: Making Money And Achieving The Best Daily or Hourly Rate – How to make £1.8 Million pounds as a Computer Contractor Or Freelancer by making the move from being a permanent employee to a contractor or freelancer in the fast moving and changing world of the computing industry. The guide uses real life examples on maximising your earnings. Personally I know I have been earning great money as a single person company for the last 20 years and I am still making £20K per month today. Make £1.8 million pounds or £20,000 per month as a Computer Contractor Or Freelancer! – for the last 20 years and I am still making £20K per month today and have an excellent life. When asked for more information about the guide, the reasons behind creating a guide on how to make £1.8 Million pounds as a Computer Contractor Or Freelancer and what they hope to accomplish with it, Mark Horrocks, Director at MCHJAP LTD said: “I wrote this guide to help people making the leap from being a permanent employee for a company to a contractor or freelancer in the fascinating and changing world of Computing. Using 20+ years of experience it guides them on maximising their hourly or daily rate and securing that first contract. It shows you how to sell yourself and make £20K per month and eventually £1.8 million pounds!” Computer Employees and anybody interested in how to make £1.8 Million pounds as a Computer Contractor Or Freelancer are invited to review the how-to guide online: http://www.howtostartcontracting.co.uk/ More information about MCHJAP LTD itself can be found at http://www.howtostartcontracting.co.uk/ # # #
